subject: To Be With You
text:
To be with you, it's spirit in the sky.
 To be with you, will shine on my lies.
 To be with you, will make the flowers bloom.
 To be with you, you take my words, than to assume.
 So to make this short, to be with you is more than love. 
 It's the knowledge that you're always above.
 So I love you just knowing I'm with you.
